response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily life or work efficiency. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $180. This special price is available only for a limited time, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this opportunity.", "product_price": 180}
